description: Installation a food hoist between the lower ground floor and upper ground floor levels. Installation of Heat Recovery Ventilation/Cooling external plant on the lower ground floor with an enclosure to conceal the units. Alter the internal arrangement of the first floor master suite through the removal of non-historic stud walls and the installation of new partitions to facilitate the desired layout. Including associated alterations to the M&E/drainage systems. Installation of new kitchen joinery and equipment (including mechanical extract) to lower ground floor and raised ground floor levels. Replacement of non historic floor finishes, cornice, and skirting across the lower ground floor, upper ground floor and first floor level.
